org.apache.ddlutils.io.converters
Class TimestampConverter

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.ddlutils.io.converters.TimestampConverter
All Implemented Interfaces:
SqlTypeConverter
public class TimestampConverter
extends Object
implements SqlTypeConverter

Converts between Timestamp and String using the standard representation "yyyy-mm-dd hh:mm:ss.fffffffff".

Version:
$Revision: 289996 $
